title: Peak online shopping hours of U.S. consumers 2015
summary: video gaming is no longer a hobby exclusively enjoyed by the young . As generations have grown up with video games a normal part of life , the age of the average gamer also increases . While 40 percent of video game players still come from the 18 to 35 age demographic , some 21 percent are 50 years and older .
gold: This statistic presents the preferred time of the day for consumers in the United States to shop online . During the April 2015 survey , 48 percent of survey respondents stated that their peak online shopping hours were between 4 and 9 PM .
